ud3.6:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud3.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:1.4: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
ud3.6:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
ud3.6:2.2: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavacchaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
ud3.6:2.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.2: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, vaccha, bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarasī”ti?
ud3.6:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivāsaṁ manasi karitvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
ud3.6:4.2: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
ud3.6:4.3: Na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:4.4: Vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni.
ud3.6:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud3.6:6.4: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
